about_the_game:
Luxcustos is a team-based Multiplayer First-Person-Shooter.

Fuel Dominion
Welcome to the most powerful enterprise on planet. Become part of our empire and keep everything running and secure.

The Rust Raiders
Join the Rust Raiders. We might be the underdog but hell freedom is what we live for.

In Luxcustos you will join one of two teams and fight to control multiple oil extraction sites on the map. Your team will earn points while those sites are under your control. Try to keep those sites safe and defend it from the other team.

- Team-based FPS with multiple weapon types (first person only)
- Capture the Flag mechanics (controlling oil exctraction sites)
- Realistic graphics (using Unreal Engine 5) *with a steampunk touch
- Big (but not hughe) maps
- Character progression (advance your skills by using them)
- Survival aspects (e.g. drinking or resting)

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Includes intense violence and blood.
